sentences.en: 'Come, come , Mr. Barsad!'exclaimed Sydney.'Don't be ungrateful.
sentences.cn: “ 好了, 好了, 巴萨 先生, ”西德尼叫道, “ 别忘恩负义了.

sentences.en: As long as you're not ungrateful, I don't care about the rest.
sentences.cn: 别的都甭说, 你别忘恩负义就得了!

sentences.en: At the risk of sounding ungrateful, I must refuse your offer.
sentences.cn: 我甘受拂逆盛情之嫌, 也必须谢绝你的提议.

sentences.en: Carrie was not ungrateful , whatever else might be said of her.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说,嘉莉不是忘恩负义的人.

sentences.en: Dey is de shiflesses, mos'ungrateful passel of no - counts livin '.
sentences.cn: 俺说过多回了,他们全是懒虫, 不识好歹.

sentences.en: How ungrateful you make us appear!
sentences.cn: 这样我们显得多么忘恩负义呀!

sentences.en: I am very sorry indeed for my foolish and ungrateful conduct.
sentences.cn: 我太愚蠢了,对不起你,真叫人难过.

sentences.en: I thought it was rather ungrateful.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这样做有些忘恩负义。

sentences.en: I won't give her any more if she's ungrateful.
sentences.cn: 要是她不领情,我就再也不给她了.

sentences.en: I've seen too many such ungrateful people. "
sentences.cn: 这种没良心的人我见得多了. ”

sentences.en: Tell Mr. Whitford how ungrateful you know you have been.
sentences.cn: 告诉惠特福德先生,你已经知道了你过去是多么不成器.

sentences.en: What in the dickens did he give me to be ungrateful about?
sentences.cn: 他究竟给了我什么可以骂我忘恩负义 呢 ?

sentences.en: You are a very nice, but an ungrateful boy.
sentences.cn: 你是个很好的孩子, 但又是个不领情的孩子.

sentences.en: You are really an ungrateful wretch to complain instead of thanking him.
sentences.cn: 你不但不谢他,还埋怨他,真不知好歹.
你这个没良心的小坏蛋。

trans.tran_cn: 不感激的，不领情的，忘恩负义的，讨厌的
trans.tran_en: not expressing thanks for something that someone has given to you or done for you
